title: Left-Hand Kelly
description: Practicing his quick draw seemed a harmless amusement...until the day a boys' quarrel exploded into gunplay.Sixteen-year-old Lew Kelly grew up idolizing his enigmatic ex-gunfighter father. But his notion of following in his father's footsteps only led to disaster.Three years later, Lew is withdrawn and bitter—and he still carries a gun. When an unexpected twist of events brings him face to face with the memories—and the consequences—of that ill-fated fight, will old wrongs finally be righted?Or will there be a worse tragedy than before?2015 Peacemaker Award Finalist for Best Independently Published Western Novel
author: Elisabeth Grace Foley
